allClosed: Registration to this edition of the Championship is closed, everything is sold out. See you next year!

common.numbersError: This field is for numbers only
common.patternError: This field can contain only Latin characters and numbers.

workshops.title: Workshops
workshops.selectTitle: Full Pass or one by one?
workshops.fullPassDescription1: It’s possible to buy workshops as a package — Full Pass or single workshops of your choice.
workshops.fullPassDescription2Live: Full Pass unlocks all the workshops, competition and Gala Show. You can pay for it in installments (except Promo tariff). Kids and Baby have 30% discount.
workshops.fullPassDescriptionSoldOut: Full Pass for this edition of Championship has been sold out. It is only possible to buy single workshops.

discounts.title: Full Pass discounts
discounts.groupDescription: 20% discount on Full Pass for registration of 3+ participants as a group. Discount won't be summarized with personal discounts or discounts for kids.
discounts.details: How did you acquire your certificate?
discounts.detailsDescription: Please state where and when did you acquire your discount certificate. As all the certificates are personal, we will check your right to use it with the organizers of an event where you won it.

contest.checkboxLabel: I want to take part in solo competition
contest.soloPassLabel: I want to buy Solo Pass
contest.solosPassDescription: With the Solo Pass you can dance unlimited times in all solo categories. You save, if you dance more than 3 times.
contest.notEligible: In order to take part in the competition all the participants are required to have at least 2 workshops (1 for baby/kids) or Full Pass.
contest.absoluteWinnerText: The contestants, who take part in 4 categories at Professionals level (Classic, Folklore, Tabla solo CD and Improvisation) automatically take part in the battle for the title of the Champion, who will get the main prizes, including the right to be a teacher for the next year. To be able to compete for the title it is mandatory to dance in all 4 of those categories mentioned. The criteria for judging improvisation and overall Champion choosing process are described on <0>Judging</0> page.

groups.title: Competition duos and groups
groups.checkboxLabel: I want to register a duo or a group
groups.name: Group / duo name
groups.qtyError: Number of dancers in a group can not be less than 3

worldShow.title: Gala show
worldShow.description: You have a unique opportunity to perform on stage with our teachers and judges during the Gala Show, which will take place on 04.04.2025!
worldShow.notEligible: In order to take part in the Gala Show all the participants are required to have at least 2 workshops (1 for kids/baby) or Full pass.
worldShow.group: I want to add duo or group
worldShow.qtyError: Number of dancers in a group can not be less than 2

summary.title: Summary
summary.rulesCheckbox: I have read and accept <0>prices and conditions</0> as well as <1>competition rules</1>

money.title: Finances
money.installments: I want to pay with 2 installments
money.installmentsDetails: There is a possibility to pay for your package in 2 installments. The first 50% should be paid right after the registration, the other 50% any time before 1.03.2025. In case if the second payment is failed to be transferred in due time, you will be fined the amount of 100€, which must be paid with the second part before the festival begins.

form.error: Oops. Something went wrong. Please try again later or contact us to resolve the issue.

email.title: We received your registration!
email.intro: Thank you for your registration to Open Bellydance Championship! We will contact you with payment confirmation and additional info as soon as we process your payment.
email.orderTitle: Here is what you sent us
email.paymentNote1: For your registration to be accepted you need to make a payment on
email.telegram1: Join our Telegram group for participants by following
email.telegram3: ATTENTION! All internal information (contest schedules, personal posters, etc.) will be posted in this group ONLY.
